title.narrative: WASH GOVERNMENT CAPACITY

description.narrative: Government has strengthened capacity for water auditing, integrated water management resource planning, and sustainable management of Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) services., which contributes to Hygiene, Sanitation, Wash â€“ General, Water, Water Supply. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children aged 6-17 access timely and quality early childhood education, basic and post-basic education in humanitarian situations in Iraq

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government has strengthened capacity for water auditing, integrated water management resource planning, and sustainable managementof WASH services.

description.narrative: To modernize water sector UNICEF supported sector regulations and accountability mechanisms for water and sanitation at national and governorate level through adoption of sustainable water auditing, resource management, initialization of new technologies, water safety programming and integration of the smart city concept into the child friendly city initiative. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:15/01/2019
